issue.title: Time search
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

CATALOG V 1.0 support a "time search" which makes queries based on update dates of the metadata/product.

A next version should be able to make searches based on the following ctiteria (ideas) :

- date of metadata update
- date of geodata update
- date of publication

A timeline feature would be a "nice-to-have", like this one http://eie.cos.gmu.edu/CSWClient/

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

These features are supported in easySDI v4:
system field : created
system field : published
custom csw : geodata update
timeline -> order field + XSL customization

I propose to reject the issue
